thread.title: Great Hotel Brillant staff
thread.title_full: Great Hotel Brillant staff - Review of Radisson Blu Edwardian Hampshire Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Scorpi077
title: Great Hotel Brillant staff
text: booked a deluxe double room, Had a great view of the city ... London eye ,Big ben.... Fantastic location Very clean ... Very polite service from staff especially Alex one of the concierge who went out of his way to get us a taxi of the street....and was very welcoming when we arrived , Defo stay again ... oh and it smells nice like a spa !!
